text: Kodi iwe sudawaone anthu a chinyengo ali kunena kwa abale awo osakhulupirira amene ali pakati pa anthu a m’Buku? (Ponena kuti): “Ngati iwo akupirikitsani inu, nafenso tidzapita nanu, ndipo sitidzamvera wina aliyense wodana ndi inu. Ngati inu muputidwa, ndithudi, ife tidzakuthandizani.” Koma Mulungu achitira umboni kuti, ndithudi, iwo ndi abodza
